title: Replication rollback to snapshot
description:
The replication handler has a "backup" command which creates snapshots in the data directory.  Oddly, there is no way to rollback to a backup.  You could do some awkward index moving and core swapping as a work-around.

A proposed "restore" command to the replication handler should allow specifying a directory, or an "as-of" date; otherwise you'd get the most recent snapshot.
